Source.Name: apache-maven
Source.Summary: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool.
Source.Description: Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a Project Object Model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

Package.Name: apache-maven
Package.Summary: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool.
Package.Description: Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a Project Object Model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.
